xuiMenuOption
directive in module xui

Description

XUI wrapper for menu option. It is used to display selectable option. It can be used only inside xuiMenu directive.

Usage

as element:
<xui-menu-option
       is-checked="{boolean}"
       is-disabled="{boolean}">
</xui-menu-option>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
is-checkedboolean

Value which indicates if menu item is selected.

is-disabledboolean

Expression to determine if menu item should be disabled.

Example
